StreamlyneConnection

The StreamlyneConnection constructor.

new StreamlyneConnection(options)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
options Object

The options for intiailizing this StreamlyneConnection.
Source:
  • streamlyne.js, line 58
Example
 var sl = Streamlyne.connect( {
     "host":"http://localhost:5000/", 
     "email":"testing@streamlyne.co", 
     "token":"sl-dev"
     });
